text: The Binghamton Devils were an American professional ice hockey team. They were in the American Hockey League (AHL). The team was in Binghamton, New York. It was the farm team for the New Jersey Devils of the NHL. The team moved to Binghamton from Albany in 2017.Their ECHL affiliate team was the Trenton Devils. The team ended operation in 2021 and became the Utica Comets. == Albany Devils == The Binghamton Devils played as the Albany Devils starting in 2010. In 2017, they moved to Binghamton. When they were located in Albany, they would play their home games in Albany, New York at the Times Union Center and sometimes at the Boardwalk Hall. ==References== ==Other websites== *Albany Devils Official Site Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:American Hockey League teams Category:New Jersey Devils Category:Albany, New York Category:2010s establishments in New York (state) Category:2010 establishments in the United States Category:2021 disestablishments in the United States
title: Binghamton Devils
